title: New client doesnt work on my laptop
body: So the old client worked fine however now when i go into queue it lags so much i cant ban champions or select my own. Is there anyway to other than getting a better laptop to solve this. can i revert to the old client? etc. many thanks ihaveahugequeue.

replies.body:
If you're running a low-spec PC, poor performance may be an issue for you when using the Beta Client. The newest update enabled some features that may alleviate your performance issues, so I'd recommend giving them a try. Hop into the client settings (cog in the top-right corner) and enable *low-spec mode* and disable *animations*. I've provided a screenshot below to visually assist you:

http://image.prntscr.com/image/598e949fe2904c85b3220875cf13760f.png

If you still see poor performance when using the Beta Client, I recommend launching the Legacy Client from the login screen from now on until we've optimized the client a bit more:

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

____
Let me know if you have any questions!
